name: coursework
description: Instructions to run this web app 1. Navigate to the directory where files are stored. 2. rum the npm init command 3. Install the following packages via the npm install command: express path bcrypt bootstrap cookie-parser dotenv jsonwebtoken mustache-express nedb 4. Create a .env file at the root of the project and provide a random string value for ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET. 5. Enter "node index" into the terminal. 6. Open a web browser and navigate to localhost:3000. 7. Login to the app with these credentials: username: admin password: Rest4ur4ntUs3r!
author: Peter McMillan
